PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05382020-07-20,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Prohibition of Entry into Canada from United States)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (PROHIBITION OF ENTRY INTO CANADA FROM THE UNITED STATES) in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) continue to prohibit entry into Canada of foreign nationals arriving from the U.S. for an optional or discretionary purpose, with some limited exceptions.
